Title: How to learn NextJS
Content: Next.js is an open-source web development framework created by Vercel enabling React-based web applications with server-side rendering and generating static websites. React documentation mentions Next.js among advising it to developers as a solution when .[4] Where traditional React apps can only render their content in the client-side browser, Next.js extends this functionality to include applications rendered on the server-side.
Author: Jhon Ahmed
metadesc: Learn NextJS in few minutes. In a friendly and helpful to bigenner and very convenient to understand. Next.js extends this functionality to include applications rendered on the server-side.
